mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as info FROM KAPLA_ORDER_DETAIL od, KAPLA_ORDER o WHERE od.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND o.USER_NO = (SELECT user_no FROM KAPLA_USER WHERE id=#{id}) AND o.REG_DATE between current_date-30 and current_date GROUP BY ORDER_STATUS

select o.order_no, o.payment_method, o.total_price,o.receiver, o.receiver_addr,o.receiver_phone,o.receiver_email,o.order_comment, TO_CHAR( o.reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date ,detail.detail_no, detail.item_no, detail.sum_price, detail.quantity, item.name, img.url, decode(detail.order_status,1,'결제완료',2,'상품준비중',3,'배송중',4,'배송완료',5,'구매확정') order_status from KAPLA_ORDER o, KAPLA_ORDER_DETAIL detail, KAPLA_ITEM item, KAPLA_ITEM_IMAGE img where o.ORDER_NO = detail.ORDER_NO and detail.ITEM_NO = item.ITEM_NO and item.ITEM_NO = img.ITEM_NO and detail.ORDER_NO=#{order_no} and o.user_no = (select user_no from KAPLA_USER where id=#{id})
